Verses: 1 avan Thanakku Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Veedugalai Undaakki, Dhevanudaiya Pettikku Oru Sthalaththai Aayaththappaduththi, Adharku Oru Koodaaraththaippottaan.

2 pirpaadu Dhaaveedhu: Leviyar Ozhiya, Veroruvarum Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Edukkalaagaadhu; Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Edukkavum, Endraikkum Avarukkup Panividaiseyyavum, Avargalai Karththar Therindhukondaar Endraan.
3 appadi Karththarudaiya Pettikkuth Thaan Aayaththappaduththina Adhin Sthalaththirku Adhaik Konduvarumpadi Dhaaveedhu Isravelaiyellaam Erusalemile Koodivarachcheydhaan.
4 aaronin Puththiraraiyum,
5 leviyaraagiya Kogaadh Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya Ooriyelaiyum Avan Sagodhararaagiya Nootrirubadhuperaiyum,
6 meraariyin Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya Asaayaavaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Irunootrirubadhuperaiyum,
7 kerson Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya Yovelaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Nootrumuppadhuperaiyum,
8 elisaappaan Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya Semaayaavaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Irunooruperaiyum,
9 epron Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya, Eliyelaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Enbadhuperaiyum,
10 oosiyel Puththiraril Prabuvaagiya Amminadhaabaiyum, Avan Sagodhararaagiya Nootruppanniranduperaiyum Dhaaveedhu Koodivarappanninaan.
11 pinbu Dhaaveedhu Aasaariyaraagiya Saadhokkaiyum, Abiyaththaaraiyum, Leviyaraagiya Ooriyel, Asaayaa, Yovel, Semaayaa, Eliyel, Amminadhaab Enbavargalaiyum Azhaiththu,

12 avargalai Nokki: Leviyaril Neengal Pidhaakkaludaiya Sandhadhigalin Thalaivar, Neengal Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Pettiyai Adharku Naan Aayaththampannina Sthalaththirkuk Konduvarumpadi, Ungalaiyum Ungal Sagodhararaiyum Parisuththampannikkollungal.
13 mudhalil Neengal Adhai Sumakkaadhapadiyinaalum, Naam Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nyaayamaanapadiye Thedaadheponapadiyinaalum, Avar Namakkulle Adivizhappanninaar Endraan.
14 appadiye Aasaariyarum Leviyarum Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Pettiyaik Konduvarath Thangalai Suththampannikkondaargal.
15 pinbu Levi Puththirar Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Mose Karpiththapragaaram Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Adhin Thandugalinaale Thangal Tholmel Eduththukkonduvandhaargal.

16 dhaaveedhu Leviyarin Prabukkalai Nokki: Neengal Ungal Sagodhararaagiya Paadagaraith Thamburu Suramandalam Kaiththaalam Mudhaliya Keedhavaaththiyangal Muzhanga Thangal Saththaththai Uyarththi, Sandhoshamundaagap Paadumpadi Niruththavendumendru Sonnaan.

17 appadiye Leviyar Yovelin Kumaaranaagiya Emaanaiyum, Avan Sagodhararil Peragiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Aasaappaiyum, Meraariyin Puththiraraana Thangal Sagodhararil Kushaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eththaanaiyum,

18 ivargalodunkooda Irandaavadhu Varisaiyaagath Thangal Sagodhararaagiya Sagariyaa, Pen, Yaasiyel, Semiramodh, Yegiyel, Unni, Eliyaab, Penaayaa, Maaseyaa, Maththiththiyaa, Elippelegu, Mikneyaa, Obedhedhom, Eyel Ennum Vaasal Kaavalaalaraiyum Niruththinaargal.
19 paadagaraagiya Emaanum, Aasaappum, Eththaanum, Panjalogak Kaiththaalangalaith Thonikkappannip Paadinaargal.
20 sagariyaa, Aasiyel, Semiramodh, Yegiyel, Unni, Eliyaab, Maaseyaa, Penaayaa Enbavargal Almodh Ennum Isaiyil Paadi, Thamburugalai Vaasiththaargal.
21 maththiththiyaa, Elippelegu, Mikneyaa, Obedhedhom, Eyel, Asasiyaa Enbavargal Semaneedh Ennum Isaiyil Paadi, Suramandalangalai Nerththiyaai Vaasiththaargal.
22 leviyarukkulle Kenaaniyaa Enbavan Sangeedhaththalaivanaayirundhaan; Avan Nibunanaanapadiyaal, Keedhaviththaiyaip Padippiththaan.
23 peragiyaavum Elkkaanaavum Pettikku Munbaagak Kaavalkaaththuvandhaargal.

24 sepaniyaa, Yosabaadh, Nedhaneyel, Amaasaayi, Sagariyaa, Penaayaa, Eliyesar Ennum Aasaariyar Dhevanudaiya Pettikku Munbaagap Poorigaigalai Oodhinaargal; Obedh Edhomum, Egiyaavum Pettikku Vaasal Kaavalaalaraayirundhaargal.
25 ippadi Dhaaveedhum, Isravelin Moopparum, Aayiraththu Servaikkaararum Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyai Obedhedhomin Veettilirundhu Magizhchchiyode Konduvarapponaargal.
26 karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaippettiyai Sumakkira Leviyarukku Dhevan Anukkiragampanninapadiyaal, Avargal Ezhu Kaalaigalaiyum Ezhu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Paliyittaargal.

27 dhaaveedhum, Pettiyai Sumakkira Sagala Leviyarum, Paadagarum, Paadagarin Velaiyai Visaarikkira Thalaivanaagiya Kenaaniyaavum, Melliya Pudavaiyaana Saalvaigalaith Thariththirundhaargal; Dhaaveedhu Sanalnool Epoththaith Thariththirundhaan.

28 appadiye Isravelanaiththum Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyaik Kembeeraththodum, Ekkaalangal Poorigaigal Kaiththaalangalin Thoniyodum Thamburugalaiyum Suramandalangalaiyum Vaasikkira Saththaththodum Konduvandhaargal.

29 karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaippetti Dhaaveedhin Nagaramattum Vandhapodhu, Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaal Palaganivazhiyaaip Paarththu, Dhaaveedhuraajaa Aadippaadi Varugiradhaik Kandu, Avanaith Than Irudhayaththile Avamadhiththaal.
